ExpanderGrantAccess: If target is not showing try granting it access using snowsight
DefineTargetModelTitle: Use our pre-built target model to quickly ingest your data
PrebuildModel: Yes, lets use the pre-built model.
CustomModel: No, thanks. I will create my own.
UploadInformation: Lets upload the information using the selected connector
GiveApplicationGrants: Give the application reading grants to the generated table
EnterSchema: Enter schema name if its not default, and press enter.
PrebuiltModelIntro: The following tables are Snowflake's recommended target model, feel free to edit the column names, types, and target lag for each model.
Top5AdsGroupsWithHighestImpressions: Top 5 Ad groups with highest impressions
Top5AdsGroupsWithHighestClicks: Top 5 Ad groups with highest clicks
RunFollowingCommand: To connect to your database and schema run the following commands in a Snowflake worksheet and click on the "Reload data" button:
NotConnected: Could not connect to your database and schema. To grant access please run the commands in the "Don't see your data?" section and click on the "Reload data" button to retry the connection.
ChangeTrackingNotEnabled: Enabling change tracking is required to continue. Please run the following command in a Snowflake worksheet.
TextChatBotWelcome: Hello I am your Cortex AI assistant!. How can I help you?
MarketingDataEngineeringAssistantDescrip: Helps Data Engineers ingest and organize marketing data within Snowflake. It helps identify and address issues such as missing data, data anomalies, duplicate rows, and data freshness, ensuring the data is clean, accurate, and ready for use by business users.
MarketingCampaignManagementAssistantDesc: Helps Campaign Management business users understand and analyze campaign performance data to optimize ROI. It provides detailed insights into past campaign performance and offers optimization suggestions for future campaigns.
DataQualityStarter: Detect company names that are fake data or spam
DataQualityStarterDesc: We need to evaluate the quality of leads who have expressed interest in Snowflake. The data was collected using a form that is available to anyone, some of the data could contain fake data or spam. We can leverage our LLM Cortex function to help us detect and filter out spam from our data set.
DataQualityStarter2Desc: When you are trying to deduplicate leads entered on our website, is important to understand possible nickname variations that a person could use rather than using their given name.
DataQualityStarter3Desc: You need to clasify the email addresses that have been entered on our website to determine if they a work email address or a personal email address.
